doc.title: Das No Problem Orchestra - Von der Freude am Leben durch Musik
doc.plot: According to the world games of Special Olympics celebrated in Schladming, Austria, the project 'No Problem Orchestra' is a very successful form of musically educating and motivating multiple handicapped people. The children are learning instruments and playing concerts in an excellent team spirit of this extraordinary and unique band. The documentary shows their success all over the world from the jazz-festival in Montreal, to Key West, Florida, USA.
